title: Walloon Front
text:
The Walloon Front for the Unity and Freedom of Wallonia (, FW) was a political party in <a href="Belgium">Belgium</a>.
History.
The FW was established by former <a href="Belgian%20Socialist%20Party">Belgian Socialist Party</a> member Robert Moreau on 19 January 1964. In the <a href="1965%20Belgian%20general%20election">1965 general elections</a> the party received 0.5% of the vote and won a single seat in the <a href="Chamber%20of%20Representatives%20%28Belgium%29">Chamber of Representatives</a>. On 26 June 1965 it merged with the <a href="Walloon%20Workers%27%20Party">Walloon Workers' Party</a>, the Walloon Democratic Rally and the Wallon Democratic Front to form the Walloon Party, the forerunner to the <a href="Walloon%20Rally">Walloon Rally</a>.
In 2013 a new Walloon Front party was established to participate in the 2014 elections.
